alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:57PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Schenectady, Albany, central Schoharie and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 630 PM EST... At 556 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richmondville, or 9 miles west of Cobleskill, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Cobleskill, Delmar, Latham, Guilderland, Menands, Berne, Voorheesville, Green Island, Altamont, Middleburgh, Castleton-On-Hudson, Summit and Schoharie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 23. Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 25. Interstate 890 near exit 9. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 7. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady
